name: Learningerlang
body:
#OK Here's the Wiki
  ##It's for learningErlang
  ###Cause that's what we're gonna do we're gonna learn us some erlang
  
  Welcome to the illustrious, well written, funny, flavorful and informative wiki for the learningErlang project.  Thank you for coming.  Please start down there where it says    'Start Here'.
  
  ## The Learning Process
  ### Start Here
  * [Erlang 101](https://github.com/nikorova/learningErlang/wiki/learningErlang-Wiki)
 * [Nodes and Networks](https://github.com/nikorova/learningErlang/wiki/nodal_networking)
 
 ## The Experiments
 ### My God, What Have We Done?
 * [hello_world.erl](https://github.com/nikorova/learningErlang/wiki/hello_world.erl)
 * [message_router.erl](https://github.com/nikorova/learningErlang/wiki/message_router.erl)
 * [chat_client.erl](https://github.com/nikorova/learningErlang/wiki/chat_client.erl)

 ##TODO
 ### My God, What Haven't We Done?
 * [Types](https://github.com/nikorova/learningErlang/wiki/)
 * [Functions](https://github.com/nikorova/learningErlang/wiki/)
 * [Erlang Messages](https://github.com/nikorova/learningErlang/wiki/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
